author: Ciaran Mullooly
title: Hospital imposes ban on attending births due to virus
description: Management at Mullingar Regional Hospital have moved to ban partners of women from attending the birth of their children in hospitals, in a new clampdown aimed at stopping the spread of Covid-19.
content:
Hospital authorities in the midlands have moved to ban partners of women from attending the birth of their children in hospitals.
In a new clampdown on hospital regulations aimed at stopping the spread of Covid-19, Mullingar Regional Hospital said this after… [+747 chars]
